message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics at this time, I assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me.  I'm willing to let it go for a price that's mutually beneficial.  I'm confident you'll find this offer highly compelling.  Would you be interested in discussing a price of $1000000?  I'm open to negotiation.
